goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals metadata for target 5.a
other_info: Data follows the UN specification for this indicator. This indicator has been identified in collaboration with topic experts.
page_content:
**Non-statistical indicator**

We have identified the following policies relevant to this indicator - [Equality Act 2010](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/equality-act-2010-guidance).
change_notice: This indicator was revised following indicator changes from the United Nations 2020 Comprehensive Review. The indicator from before these revisions has been archived.
